content: --स्यं {1} everything, the whole of one's possessions; as in सर्वस्वदंडः, सर्वस्वहरणं ‘confiscation of the whole property.’ {2} the very essence, the all-in-all of anything: सर्वस्वं तदहो महाकविगिरां कामस्य चांभोरुह <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>, see <ls>Ś. 1. 24</ls>; <ls n="Ś.">6. 1</ls>; <ls>Māl. 8. 6</ls>; <ls>Bv. 1. 63.</ls>
